short_summary: Supply of electrical equipment and components
description: As a requirement of the Supply Arrangement (SA) this notice is published for a period of 15 calendar days. Only pre-qualified Suppliers have been invited to bid. Suppliers that do not already hold a Supply Arrangement in series E60HN-16ELEC with PSPC cannot submit a bid. The Canadian Armed Forces requires the items listed in the attached product list, OR THE EQUIVALENT. Requested delivery date for all of the above mentioned goods is 31 March 2024.

full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Electrical & Electronic Products

**Reference Number:** cb-909-58464333
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** W2665-23-B024/A
**Publication Date:** 2024-02-01
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-16 10:00:00

**Procurement Details**

* **UNSPSC Code:** 39120000
	+ Description: Electrical equipment and components and supplies
* **Description:** The Canadian Armed Forces is seeking to acquire electrical and electronic products as listed in the attached product list or equivalent.
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Region of Delivery:** Saguenay, Quebec

**Contracting Entity**

* **Name:** 2 Wing
* **Address:**

    CFB Bagotville, PO 5000, Succ. Head Office
    Alouette, Quebec
    G0V 1A0
    Canada

**Contact Information**

* **Name:** Kayla Owen
* **Email:** 2msscontracts@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (418) 254-8117

**Tender Documents**

* **Product List:** Available on the Canada Buys website (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30995/w2665-23-b024-product-list---liste-des-articles_2.pdf)

**Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement

**Procurement Category:** GD

**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-02-29
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

The Canadian Armed Forces is seeking to acquire electrical and electronic products as listed in the attached product list or equivalent. Only pre-qualified suppliers have been invited to bid. Deadline for submission is 2024-02-16 10:00:00.

Please note that suppliers who do not already hold a Supply Arrangement in series E60HN-16ELEC with PSPC cannot submit a bid. Delivery is requested for 31 March 2024. For more information, please visit the Canada Buys website. Vous pouvez also contact Kayla Owen at 2msscontracts@forces.gc.ca. 

Ce contenu est disponible en français
